about_the_game:
Demo contains

  • Four combat levels from solo-campaign.

  • One secret level with experimental gameplay (I am an indie game).

  • Simulation Editor and Community Workshop with user created maps (unlocks in the story)

  • Love for tactical gameplay

    This game is young and constantly updated, join our growing Discord community if you want to discuss it.

Gameplay

  • Real-time tactics focused on simulating modern firefights guided from the drone.

  • Take the lead of five brave soldiers, split into three squads: Alpha, Bravo, and Charlie.

  • Orchestrate actions of your troops in real-time from the drone flying above the battlefield.

  • Suppress your enemies and storm their positions.

  • Use variety of equipment such as rocket launchers, bomb-drones, or artillery barrage to crack especially tough defense.

  • Avoid casualties.

  • Use Level Editor and Community Workshop to create your own combat experiences and share them with other drone operators.

Story

Your country is invaded. Military organization VEIL invites you to join as a tester for their new drone-based warfare communication system.

You can impact the situation on the battlefield directly from your home PC. Connect to the variety of drones and provide guidance to the troops in the field.

Some of our troops are equipped with the new generation of combat visors and will be able to receive your direct guidance from the sky.

They put trust in you and will shoot or move wherever you tell them, but be careful and weigh every step, because the price of your mistake is someone’s life.

Meta-Gameplay

  • Use in-game operation system called VEIL OS to connect to your missions.

  • Manage emails, install and maintain OS software to make sure you're using up-to-date technology.

  • Witness eerie events and try to uncover the truth in the conspiracy surrounding your employer, VEIL CORP.

  • Use help from the outside to affect the fabric of in-game reality and change the outcome of existing events.

  • Be careful whom you trust.

Use remote environment called VEIL OS to connect to your missions and to navigate through conspiracies in reality-bending meta-gameplay.

Equipment

If the situation is dire, use bomb drone to clean your way.

Or rocket launchers, to find the new ways of resolving tactical puzzles.

Witness with your own eyes why modern war is not a Hollywood movie.

Create your own combat experiences and share them with other drone operators in Community Workshop. (You can unlock it during the story).

if you're interested and want to see latest updates or want to share anything related to the game, I will be happy to see you in project Discord, Instagram or TikTok.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game depicts realities of war.
People are shooting each other, and some of them die.
There is no gore, but blood splatters are used to indicate hits.
You also have to drop grenades on people from the drone.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 6th generation Intel
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 1050
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: If you need sound
  • Additional Notes: There is a special version for low spec GPUs available. Check beta branch -> forward_shading.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: 11th generation of Intel or higher
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 2060 or higher
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Recommended
  • Additional Notes: By default game is using RTX if supported. If you have GeForce 2060, then I suggest you to swap to "non_rtx" beta branch. This will disable forced RTX.

short_description: Real-time dynamic tactics with the strong focus on squad positioning and collaboration. Connect to the warzone from your home PC and orchestrate modern military operations from the Drone Perspective.
